name: Level 2048
description:
Note : I underestimated the amount of homework I would get this week so the end product is incredibly unpolished and lacks music in the later levels, please keep that in mind when trying my other games. Some of that will be fixed in a post-jam version

This is a 2048 clone but with levels, that's it

You can navigate the menu's with the mouse and play using the arrow keys. You can also press the buttons in the menus in the levels with the mouse.

Credit :

Programming and Art : Me

Music and sfx : Christian SkM

Here's Christians's soundcloud : www.soundcloud.com/cskolimovski
